clientId.title: Volvo API Client ID
clientId.description: Client ID from Volvo Developer Portal

clientSecret.title: Volvo API Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Client Secret from Volvo Developer Portal

vccApiKey.title: VCC API Key
vccApiKey.description: Primary or Secondary VCC API Key from Volvo Developer Portal

refreshToken.title: Refresh Token
refreshToken.description: OAuth refresh token (will be obtained automatically)

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (minutes)
pollingInterval.description: How often to check vehicle status (respects API rate limits)

enableBattery.title: Enable Battery Service
enableBattery.description: Show battery level and charging status

enableClimate.title: Enable Climate Service
enableClimate.description: Show climate control (requires Connected Vehicle API)

enableLocks.title: Enable Lock Service
enableLocks.description: Show door lock status and control (requires Connected Vehicle API)

enableDoors.title: Enable Door Sensors
enableDoors.description: Show individual door and window status (requires Extended Vehicle API)
